item.title: Today’s Wordle #1690: Hints and Answer for February 3, 2026
item.content:encoded:
Wordle challenges players to guess a fresh five-letter word each day in six tries or fewer. Whether you’re a beginner or a daily player, today’s tips and strategies can help you solve it faster and maintain your streak—if you’re open to a little extra help. So, if you’ve found yourself stuck with today’s Wordle, don’t worry, below you’ll find some helpful hints and even the answer for Wordle Game #1690 for February 3, 2026

To play today’s Wordle, head to the game’s website. If you want to go right to today’s answer without any tips or tricks, you can click right here.

IMPORTANT: The following information includes spoilers on today’s and yesterday’s editions of Wordle. If you don’t want the answer given to you, stop scrolling.

How To Play Wordle

Wordle is a simple but addictive word puzzle. Each day, players have to guess a five-letter word answer in no more than six attempts. After each guess:

  • Green letters are correct and in the right position.
  • Yellow letters are correct, but in the wrong position.
  • Gray letters are not in the word at all.

The goal is to guess the word in as few tries as possible. Daily puzzles keep players coming back for more, making it a fun brain exercise and a popular online trend.

Wordle can only be played on the New York Times website. There is currently no app for you to download the official game.

Wordle Hints For Today, February 3, 2026

The Wordle answer for game #1690 is tough, but still slightly easier than yesterday’s. According to the NY Times Wordle review, today’s answer takes an average of 5 of 6 guesses. That makes it easier than the 5.3-guess average from February 2.

General Wordle Hints For February 3

Without giving today’s Wordle answer completely away, here are a few helpful hints for today to get you started:

  • Hint 1: This word is most often used as a verb.
  • Hint 2: It’s commonly tied to decisions, judgment, or measurement.
  • Hint 3: The action can be literal or figurative, depending on context.
  • Hint 4: You’ll often see it used when someone is considering options.

Use these clues to narrow down your guesses and increase your chances of solving Wordle #1690 for February 3, 2026.

Starter Words For February 3, 2026

If you want help getting started without having today’s Wordle answer given to you, there are a few starter words worth trying that will help you figure out some included letters. A few starter words that may help are:

  • WHITE
  • HEIST
  • EIGHT
  • WEDGE

Today’s Wordle Answer For Game #1690 On February 3, 2026

If you’ve tried everything, including using the above hints, and are still stuck, you can find the answer to today’s Wordle below.

Answer: WEIGH

If you solved today’s Wordle without our answer, congratulations! If not, take note of the best tips above for tomorrow’s puzzle, and check back daily for more hints.

What Does Today’s Wordle Answer Mean?

WEIGH is a verb that means “to determine or ascertain the force that gravitation exerts upon (a person or thing) by use of a balance, scale, or other mechanical device.”

Yesterday’s Wordle Answer

If you missed the previous game, here’s yesterday’s Wordle answer for Game #1689 on February 2, 2026

Answer: CIGAR

While not always the case, looking at previous words can sometimes give you insight into common patterns or letter usage in Wordle puzzles.

When Is The Next Wordle Game After #1690?

Wordle games are updated daily at 12 am or Midnight in your respective time zone. Information about the next game is often available in the hours before to give players a heads up. The game on February 4 will be Wordle Game #1691.

What Is Wordle?

Wordle is a daily word puzzle created by Josh Wardle. Initially developed as a prototype in 2013, it wasn’t fully released until 2021. The game challenges players to guess a five-letter word in six tries or fewer, using hints from each attempt to narrow down the answer. Its straightforward concept, accessibility, and the thrill of solving a new puzzle each day helped it surge in popularity by late 2021. The success of Wordle inspired numerous spin-offs and social media challenges, leading to its acquisition by The New York Times in early 2022.

For even more Insider Gaming delivered straight to your inbox, sign up for our weekly newsletter.

Mike has been covering the gaming industry since 2012, and has reported on some of the largest events in the industry while also working as an investigative reporter. Outside of…

item.title: Complete Reanimal Trophy List—How To Get All Achievements & Trophies
item.content:encoded:
If you enjoy diving beyond the surface of a game and strive to fully complete them, then Reanimal may well be a game for you. It features an extensive trophy list, and you’ll need to engage with every aspect of the game if you want to complete it.

That being said, you might want to know them before launching into a playthrough. There’s nothing more frustrating than missing a trophy and having to replay an area or mission, so if you’re looking to avoid that mishap with Reanimal, then check out the trophy list below.

All Reanimal Trophies & Achievements

You’ll need to complete Reanimal and discover the secret ending, as well as find a host of collectables, if you’re looking to earn every trophy and achievement.

Here’s the complete trophy list:

How Many Achievements & Trophies In Reanimal?

There’s a total of 32 PlayStation Trophies to earn for Reanimal, with one less available for Xbox Achievements.

Fans have long called for an Xbox equivalent to the ever-coveted Platinum Trophy that PlayStation has, but as things stand, there’s nothing in place. Therefore, anyone playing Reanimal on Xbox platforms will only have 31 Achievements to earn.

Will you be striving to 100% complete Reanimal? Share your goals in the official Insider Gaming Discord Server.

item.title: Does ARC Raiders Have A PvE Mode? ARC Raiders PvE Rumor, Explained
item.content:encoded:
Between PvP, PvE, and PvPvE, there are a lot of terms to remember in online shooters. ARC Raiders is notorious for its player versus player and player versus AI gameplay, but many raiders just want a PvE experience.

The thought of coming up against another human player is a double-edged sword in ARC Raiders. On one hand, they could be a noob and a far less tough adversary compared to AI, or they could be a pinpoint wizard who can laser you from a mile away.

Is There A PvE Mode In ARC Raiders?

ARC Raiders does not have a dedicated PvE mode, and playlist options are restricted purely to PvPvE gameplay, incorporating both human and AI threats.

The call for a PvE-specific game mode grows stronger week by week. ARC Raiders’ player base is still holding strong months after launch, but a large segment of the audience wants PvE.

  • More IG: ARC Raiders budget was $75 Million, it’s claimed

Embark is freshening things up, but a Solo Vs Squads Matchmaking option isn’t something people are crying out for. The community wants PvE, and they currently aren’t getting it.

ARC Raiders PvE Rumor, Explained

A social media post from the Speranza Intel X account unexpectedly went viral and caused a lot of confusion as it unintentionally caused ARC Raiders fans to think Embark had confirmed a PvE mode was arriving in 2026.

On February 1, Speranza Intel posted:

“Embark Studios has officially ⁿᵒᵗ confirmed the introduction of a PvE mode, planned for release in Q2 2026.”

Because of the way it’s worded and the style of the font and size on “not,” it’s very easy to overlook the word. The message has since racked up over 800,000 views on X, and word of mouth through the grapevine is a powerful and dangerous tool.

The account later apologized for the initial message, outing its “joke tweet,” and confirming that Embark has given no confirmation about a PvE mode.

Will PvE Ever Come To ARC Raiders?

The developer is always working on new content for ARC Raiders, and while Embark has not mentioned that PvE is coming, it’s always a possibility.

This is 100% specualtion more than anything else. However, Embark generally listens to fans. With so much planned in the 2026 roadmap and more game modes and LTMs on the way, it’s impossible to rule out a PvE-only mode arriving.

  • More IG: What is aggression-based matchmaking in ARC Raiders?

Stay tuned as Insider Gaming continues to bring you the latest on ARC Raiders news, with more guides planned.

Do you think ARC Raiders is destined to get a PvE mode? Have you seen a report or interview clip that suggests PvE is happening? Let IG know via the free-to-join Insider Gaming Discord Server.

Make sure you know how to easily complete all ARC Raiders Trials from February 2 and how to find all Rubber Ducks.

item.title: Is Romeo Is A Dead Man On Xbox Game Pass?
item.content:encoded:
Console boundaries are constantly shifting, especially concerning Xbox. It seems like most of their titles are playable on other platforms, and plenty of them are available as part of the Game Pass service.

When it comes to third-party titles like Romeo Is A Dead Man, though, it’s not always a guarantee that they’ll appear on Xbox, let alone on Game Pass. If you were hoping to pick up Suda51’s latest title on Game Pass, then allow Insider Gaming to let you know if you stand a chance.

Is Romeo Is A Dead Man Available On Xbox?

Yes, Romeo Is A Dead Man will be available to play on both Xbox Series X|S.

Suda51’s titles have appeared on Xbox platforms in the past, so it’s not surprising that Romeo Is A Dead Man will be available on the Series X|S. With the latest and greatest consoles available, expect to see bloody and gory brilliance like Grasshopper Manufacture has never displayed before.

However, while it may be available on the console, that doesn’t mean it will necessarily appear on Xbox Game Pass.

Is Romeo Is A Dead Man Coming To Game Pass?

Whilst Romeo Is A Dead Man will be playable on Xbox consoles, it won’t be available as part of the Xbox Game Pass service.

Whilst it may not launch on the service, that’s not to say that it will never be available there in the future. Xbox often pick up third-party titles after they’ve released and includes them as part of the deal—maybe Romeo Is A Dead Man could feature down the line?

If it ever does, Insider Gaming will be the first to let you know, so keep your eyes peeled on the site and the official Insider Gaming Discord Server for Xbox Game Pass updates.

For more Insider Gaming, check out the 8 best games to play if you like Hytale.
